Ventilator:
Venilator

Programmed Turbine based small portable ventilator featuring 14 different modes of Ventilation. Responsibilities includes:

  • 14 different modes of Ventilation
  • OTA(Over The Air Firmware Update)
  • Power Management
  • Sensors Calibration
  • Communication of the ventilator with the Android
  • Developed algorithm for inhalation & exhalation

Website
Coil_Marking:
Coil_Marking

Coil Marking Robot which was designed to mark hot steel coils at the temperature of 1000 C. The Robot was specifically designed for Essar Steel Manufacturing Plant, Surat, Gujarat. INDIA
Scarfing:
Scarfing

This Scarfing Robot's purpose is to scarf the Steel slabs from all the faces using a high temperature torch. It was designed for Essar Steel Manufacturing Plant, Surat.
help:
• path - display current directory
  • cat FILENAME - display FILENAME in window
  • cd DIRECTORY - move into DIRECTORY or just cd to return to root
  • ls - show files in current directory
  • history - see your command history
  • clear - clear current window
